item.title: Where could my Integration Manager be hiding?
item.description:
A user encountering an issue in Microsoft Dynamics GP where the “Integration Manager” option under Tools > Integrate appears unresponsive, despite having proper security permissions and the application launching correctly from the Start menu, can resolve this problem with a simple fix. The solution involves navigating to the Microsoft Dynamics GP program directory (typically located at C:\Program Files\Microsoft Dynamics\GP) and locating the “Dex.ini” file within the Data folder. Open this file using Notepad and verify that the file paths specified for “IntegrationManagerExePath” and “IMWizard” are accurate, making any necessary corrections...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/where-could-my-integration-manager-be-hiding/
